tagdetail.name: Abstain
tagdetail.description: Number of votes expressed as abstain for one resolution.

tagdetail.name: Accepted
tagdetail.description: Specifies whether a resolution is accepted or not.

tagdetail.name: AccountDetails
tagdetail.description: Identification of the securities account.

tagdetail.name: AccountIdentification
tagdetail.description: Unique and unambiguous identification for the account between the account owner and the account servicer.

tagdetail.name: AccountOwner
tagdetail.description: Party that legally owns the account.

tagdetail.name: AdditionalDocumentationURLAddress
tagdetail.description: Address to use over the www (HTTP) service where addtional information on the meeting may be found.

tagdetail.name: AdditionalInformation
tagdetail.description: Information on where additionnal information can be received.

tagdetail.name: AdditionalVotingRequirements
tagdetail.description: Additional information on specific requirements for allowing a person to vote.

tagdetail.name: Address
tagdetail.description: Postal address of a party.

tagdetail.name: AddressLine
tagdetail.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services, that is presented in free format text.

tagdetail.name: AddressType
tagdetail.description: Identifies the nature of the postal address.

tagdetail.name: Against
tagdetail.description: Number of votes against one resolution

tagdetail.name: AgainstManagement
tagdetail.description: Number of votes against the voting recommendation of the management.

tagdetail.name: AlienRegistrationNumber
tagdetail.description: Number assigned by a government agency to identify foreign nationals.

tagdetail.name: Amendment
tagdetail.description: Information specific to an amendment.

tagdetail.name: Amount
tagdetail.description: Price expressed as a currency and value.

tagdetail.name: AnnouncementDate
tagdetail.description: Official meeting announcement date.

tagdetail.name: AttendanceCardDetails
tagdetail.description: Specifies details related to the attendance card.

tagdetail.name: AttendanceCardLabelling
tagdetail.description: Information to be indicated on the attendance card.

tagdetail.name: AttendanceConfirmationDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date and time by which the beneficial owner or agent must notify of their intention to participate in a meeting. This deadline is set by an intermediary.

tagdetail.name: AttendanceConfirmationInformation
tagdetail.description: Indicates how to order the attendance card or to give notice of attendance.

tagdetail.name: AttendanceConfirmationMarketDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date and time by which the attendance to the meeting should be confirmed. This deadline is set by the issuer.

tagdetail.name: AttendanceConfirmationSTPDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date and time by which the beneficial owner or agent must notify of their intention to participate in a meeting (STP mode). This deadline is set by an intermediary.

tagdetail.name: AttendanceRequired
tagdetail.description: Indicates whether physical participation to a meeting is required in order to be allowed to vote.

tagdetail.name: AuthorisedProxy
tagdetail.description: Specifies the proxy persons which are authorised by the issuer.

tagdetail.name: BICOrBEI
tagdetail.description: Unique and unambiguous identifier for an organisation that is allocated by an institution;

tagdetail.name: Balance
tagdetail.description: Total quantity of financial instrument for the referenced holding.

tagdetail.name: BalanceType
tagdetail.description: Reason a security is not available or additional information about the financial instrument for which the balance is given, for example, unregistered, registered in nominee name.

tagdetail.name: BirthName
tagdetail.description: Name received at birth, eg, maiden name.

tagdetail.name: BlockingSecurities
tagdetail.description: Request to block the securities

tagdetail.name: BuildingNumber
tagdetail.description: Number that identifies the position of a building on a street.

tagdetail.name: BeneficialOwnerDisclosure
tagdetail.description: Indicates whether beneficiary details (eg name and address) must be supplied in order to take part to a meeting.

tagdetail.name: CUSIP
tagdetail.description: Committee on Uniform Securities and Identification Procedures (CUSIP). The standards body that created and maintains the securities classification system in the US. The CUSIP is composed of a 9-character number that uniquely identifies a particular security. Non-US securities have a similar number called the CINS number.

tagdetail.name: Code
tagdetail.description: Specifies the reason for cancelling a meeting in coded form.

tagdetail.name: CalculationDate
tagdetail.description: Date of calculation of the total number of oustanding securities.

tagdetail.name: Classification
tagdetail.description: Classifies the type of meeting.

tagdetail.name: CreationDateTime
tagdetail.description: Date of creation of the message.

tagdetail.name: ContactPerson
tagdetail.description: Identifies a contact person by a name, a given name and an address.

tagdetail.name: ContactPersonDetails
tagdetail.description: Contact person at the party organising the meeting, at the issuer or at an intermediary.

tagdetail.name: Country
tagdetail.description: Nation with its own government.

tagdetail.name: CountrySubDivision
tagdetail.description: Identifies a subdivision of a country eg, state, region, county.

tagdetail.name: CancellationIdentification
tagdetail.description: Identifies the cancellation message.

tagdetail.name: CancellationReason
tagdetail.description: Provides more information on the reason for cancelling a meeting in free format form.

tagdetail.name: CancellationStatus
tagdetail.description: Status applying to the instruction cancellation request received. The instruction cancellation is identified by the InstructionCancellationIdentification.

tagdetail.name: Deadline
tagdetail.description: Date by which the information on proxy assignment must be received by the intermediary.

tagdetail.name: Description
tagdetail.description: Description of the premium.

tagdetail.name: DeliveryMethod
tagdetail.description: Specifies where the attendance card must be delivered.

tagdetail.name: DomesticIdentificationSource
tagdetail.description: Country of the proprietary identification scheme.

tagdetail.name: DriversLicenseNumber
tagdetail.description: Number assigned by a license authority to a driver's license.

tagdetail.name: Discretionary
tagdetail.description: Number of votes for which decision is left to the party that will exercise the voting right.

tagdetail.name: Date
tagdetail.description: Date expressed as a calendar date.

tagdetail.name: DateAndTime
tagdetail.description: Date and time at which the meeting will take place.

tagdetail.name: DateCode
tagdetail.description: Indicates that date is unknown.

tagdetail.name: DateStatus
tagdetail.description: Indicates the status of a meeting date.

tagdetail.name: DetailedInstructionStatus
tagdetail.description: Status applying to individual instructions of a MeetingInstruction.

tagdetail.name: ElectronicVote
tagdetail.description: Electronic address, e-mail or website, where a security holder can vote.

tagdetail.name: Eligibility
tagdetail.description: Defines the dates determining eligibility.

tagdetail.name: EmailAddress
tagdetail.description: Address for electronic mail (e-mail).

tagdetail.name: EmployingParty
tagdetail.description: Organisation represented by a person, or for which a person works.

tagdetail.name: EntitlementDescription
tagdetail.description: Specifies the calculation method of the number of votes assigned to one security. This element should be used when the entitlement calculation rule is complex.

tagdetail.name: EntitlementFixingDate
tagdetail.description: Date at which the positions are struck to note which parties will receive the entitlement, e.g. record date, book close date...

tagdetail.name: EntitlementNotificationIdentification
tagdetail.description: Identifies the notification of entitlement instruction.

tagdetail.name: EntitlementRatio
tagdetail.description: Number of votes assigned to one security.

tagdetail.name: EntitlementSpecification
tagdetail.description: Specifies the entitlement ratio and the different deadlines for calculating the entitlement.

tagdetail.name: FaceAmount
tagdetail.description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, ie, the principal, of a debt instrument.

tagdetail.name: FaxNumber
tagdetail.description: Collection of information that identifies a FAX number, as defined by telecom services.

tagdetail.name: For
tagdetail.description: Number of votes in favour of one resolution

tagdetail.name: ForInformationOnly
tagdetail.description: Indicates whether the resolution is listed for information or for voting.

tagdetail.name: GlobalInstructionStatus
tagdetail.description: Status applying globally to the instruction received. The instruction is identified by the InstructionIdentification.

tagdetail.name: GlobalVoteInstruction
tagdetail.description: Instruction specifiying a vote instruction per resolution for the entire entitlement.

tagdetail.name: GivenName
tagdetail.description: First name of a person.

tagdetail.name: HoldingBalance
tagdetail.description: Net position of a segregated holding of a single security within the overall position held in a securities account, eg, sub-balance per status.

tagdetail.name: ISIN
tagdetail.description: International Securities Identification Number (ISIN). A numbering system designed by the United Nation's International Organisation for Standardisation (ISO). The ISIN is composed of a 2-character prefix representing the country of issue, followed by the national security number (if one exists), and a check digit. Each country has a national numbering agency that assigns ISIN numbers for securities in that country.

tagdetail.name: Identification
tagdetail.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of a person, eg passport.

tagdetail.name: IdentificationAsCountry
tagdetail.description: Place of safekeeping expressed with a country code.

tagdetail.name: IdentificationAsDSS
tagdetail.description: Place of safekeeping expressed with a propriety identification scheme.

tagdetail.name: IdentificationType
tagdetail.description: Specifies the nature of the identifier. Usage: IdentificationType is used to specify what kind of identifier is used. It should be used in case the identifier is different from the identifiers listed in the pre-defined identifier list.

tagdetail.name: IdentityCardNumber
tagdetail.description: Number assigned by a national authority to an identity card.

tagdetail.name: IncentivePremium
tagdetail.description: Cash premium paid to the security holder when voting.

tagdetail.name: Information
tagdetail.description: Proprietary information, often a code, issued by the data source scheme issuer.

tagdetail.name: InstructedBalance
tagdetail.description: Quantity of securities in the sub-balance.

tagdetail.name: InstructedPosition
tagdetail.description: Identifies the account and instructed positions for which the instruction cancellation request applies.

tagdetail.name: InstructingParty
tagdetail.description: Party notifying the instructions.

tagdetail.name: Instruction
tagdetail.description: Identifies the position of the instructing party and the action that they want to take.

tagdetail.name: InstructionCancellationIdentification
tagdetail.description: Uniquely identifies the cancellation request.

tagdetail.name: InstructionIdentification
tagdetail.description: Identifies the meeting instruction message for which the status is provided.

tagdetail.name: InstructionStatus
tagdetail.description: Status applying to the instruction request received. The instruction is identified by the InstructionIdentification.

tagdetail.name: Issuer
tagdetail.description: Specifies the institution that is the issuer of the security to which the meeting applies.

tagdetail.name: IssuerAgent
tagdetail.description: Agents of the issuer.

tagdetail.name: IssuerLabel
tagdetail.description: Numbering of the resolution as specified by the issuer or its agent.

tagdetail.name: IssuerMeetingIdentification
tagdetail.description: Identification assigned to a meeting by the issuer. It must be unique for the issuer.

tagdetail.name: Location
tagdetail.description: Place of the company meeting for the scheduled meeting date.

tagdetail.name: LocationCode
tagdetail.description: Indicates that the location is unknown.

tagdetail.name: LegalRequirement
tagdetail.description: Specifies whether the power of attorney needs to be validated by some authority.

tagdetail.name: ManagementRecommendation
tagdetail.description: Indicates how the management of the issuing company wishes the security holders to vote.

tagdetail.name: MarketDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date by which the information on proxy assignment must be received by the issuer.

tagdetail.name: EmployerIdentificationNumber
tagdetail.description: Number assigned to an employer by a registration authority.

tagdetail.name: MessageCancellation
tagdetail.description: Information indicating that the cancellation of a message previously sent is requested (and not the cancellation of the meeting).

tagdetail.name: Meeting
tagdetail.description: Specifies information about the meeting. This component contains meeting identifications, various deadlines, contact persons, electronic and postal locations for accessing information and proxy assignment parameters.

tagdetail.name: MeetingAttendee
tagdetail.description: Identification of the security holder who will attend and vote at the meeting in person and/or a person assigned by the security holder to attend the meeting without having any voting rights or taking any action.

tagdetail.name: MeetingDateAndTime
tagdetail.description: Date and time at which the meeting will take place.

tagdetail.name: MeetingDetails
tagdetail.description: Dates and details of the shareholders meeting.

tagdetail.name: MeetingIdentification
tagdetail.description: Identification assigned to a general meeting by the party notifying the meeting. It must be unique for the party notifying the meeting.

tagdetail.name: MeetingInstructionIdentification
tagdetail.description: Identifies the meeting instruction message.

tagdetail.name: MeetingInstructionStatusIdentification
tagdetail.description: Identifies the meeting instruction status message.

tagdetail.name: MeetingNotificationIdentification
tagdetail.description: Identifies the meeting notification message.

tagdetail.name: MeetingReference
tagdetail.description: Series of elements which allow to identify a meeting.

tagdetail.name: MeetingResultDisseminationIdentification
tagdetail.description: Identifies the meeting dissemination notification message.

tagdetail.name: Name
tagdetail.description: Name by which a party is known and which is usually used to identify that party.

tagdetail.name: NameAndAddress
tagdetail.description: Name by which a party is known and which is usually used to identify that party.

tagdetail.name: NamePrefix
tagdetail.description: Specifies the terms used to formally address a person, eg, Ms.

tagdetail.name: NoAction
tagdetail.description: Number of votes for which no action has been taken.

tagdetail.name: Narrative
tagdetail.description: Additional information.

tagdetail.name: NotificationStatus
tagdetail.description: Defines the global status of the event contained in the notification.

tagdetail.name: NotifyingParty
tagdetail.description: Party notifying the cancellation of the meeting.

tagdetail.name: NotifyingPartyRecommendation
tagdetail.description: Indicates how the notifying party recommends that the security holders vote.

tagdetail.name: OtherAddress
tagdetail.description: Name and address of a party.

tagdetail.name: OtherDocumentation
tagdetail.description: Specifies the documents needed to obtain a valid power of attorney.

tagdetail.name: OtherIdentification
tagdetail.description: Identifier issued to a person for which no specific identifier has been defined.

tagdetail.name: PercentageOfVotingRights
tagdetail.description: Percentage of rights participating to the vote versus total voting rights.

tagdetail.name: PerAttendee
tagdetail.description: Indicates that the premium is given per attendee.

tagdetail.name: PerSecurity
tagdetail.description: Number of securities giving right to a premium.

tagdetail.name: PerVote
tagdetail.description: Number of votes giving right to a premium.

tagdetail.name: PhoneNumber
tagdetail.description: Collection of information that identifies a phone number, as defined by telecom services.

tagdetail.name: PlaceOfListing
tagdetail.description: The identification of a financial market, as stipulated in the norm ISO 10383 'Codes for exchanges and market identifications'.

tagdetail.name: PlaceSafekeeping
tagdetail.description: Place of safekeeping as a code.

tagdetail.name: PaymentDate
tagdetail.description: Date for the payment of the premium.

tagdetail.name: Position
tagdetail.description: Amount of securities that are eligible for the vote.

tagdetail.name: ProcessingStatus
tagdetail.description: Status advising on the processing of the cancellation request.

tagdetail.name: PersonDetails
tagdetail.description: Person, other than the Chairman of the meeting, assigned by the security holder as proxy.

tagdetail.name: PreassignedProxy
tagdetail.description: Identifies an authorized proxy which has been assigned by the issuer of the meeting.

tagdetail.name: Participation
tagdetail.description: Information about the participation to the voting process.

tagdetail.name: ParticipationRegistration
tagdetail.description: Request to register for participation to the meeting.

tagdetail.name: PartialVoteAllowed
tagdetail.description: Specifies whether it is allowed to only vote on a part of the entire holding, leaving part of the position un-voted.

tagdetail.name: ProprietaryIdentification
tagdetail.description: Unique and unambiguous identifier, as assigned to a financial institution using a proprietary identification scheme.

tagdetail.name: ProprietaryIdentificationSource
tagdetail.description: Entity that issues the proprietary identification.

tagdetail.name: PreviousReference
tagdetail.description: Identifies the instruction to be cancelled.

tagdetail.name: Proxy
tagdetail.description: Identification of the person appointed by the security holder as proxy.

tagdetail.name: ProxyAppointmentNotificationAddress
tagdetail.description: Address where the information on the proxy should be sent.

tagdetail.name: ProxyNotAllowed
tagdetail.description: Indicates that no proxy is allowed for a meeting.

tagdetail.name: ProxyType
tagdetail.description: Specifies the type of proxy.

tagdetail.name: PassportNumber
tagdetail.description: Number assigned by a passport authority to a passport.

tagdetail.name: PostCode
tagdetail.description: Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers that is added to a postal address to assist the sorting of mail.

tagdetail.name: Party
tagdetail.description: Place of safekeeping.

tagdetail.name: PowerOfAttorneyRequirements
tagdetail.description: Specifies requirements relative to the use of Power of Attorney.

tagdetail.name: QUICK
tagdetail.description: Identifier of a security assigned by the Japanese QUICK identification scheme for financial instruments.

tagdetail.name: QuorumQuantity
tagdetail.description: Minimum quantity of securities required to hold a meeting.

tagdetail.name: QuorumQuantityPercentage
tagdetail.description: Minimum quantity of securities, expressed as a percentage, required to hold a meeting.

tagdetail.name: QuorumRequired
tagdetail.description: Specifies whether a minimum number of security representation is required to hold a meeting.

tagdetail.name: Rate
tagdetail.description: Price expressed as a rate, ie, percentage.

tagdetail.name: ReconfirmInstructions
tagdetail.description: Indicates whether instructions must be resent (in case of modification of the parameters of a meeting for which instructions have already been sent).

tagdetail.name: RegistrationMethod
tagdetail.description: Indicates how to register a proxy.

tagdetail.name: RegistrationParticipationDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date by which the holder needs to register its intention to participate in the meeting process in order to be allowed to participate in the meeting event. This deadline is specified by an intermediary.

tagdetail.name: RegistrationParticipationMarketDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date by which the holder needs to register its intention to participate in the meeting process in order to be allowed to participate in the meeting event. This deadline is set by the issuer.

tagdetail.name: RegistrationParticipationSTPDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date by which the holder needs to register its intention to participate in the meeting process in order to be allowed to participate in the meeting event. This deadline is specified by an intermediary (STP mode).

tagdetail.name: RegistrationSecuritiesDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date by which the securities have to be registered. This deadline is specified by an intermediary.

tagdetail.name: RegistrationSecuritiesMarketDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date by which the securities have to be registered. This deadline is set by the issuer.

tagdetail.name: RegistrationSecuritiesSTPDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date by which the securities have to be registered. This deadline is specified by an intermediary (STP mode).

tagdetail.name: RequestedExecutionDate
tagdetail.description: Date at which the instruction must be executed.

tagdetail.name: RightsHolder
tagdetail.description: Owner of the voting rights.

tagdetail.name: RejectionStatus
tagdetail.description: Status advising on the rejection of the cancellation request.

tagdetail.name: RelatedReference
tagdetail.description: Identifies the meeting entitlement message to be modified.

tagdetail.name: Role
tagdetail.description: Specifies the role of the Issuer agent.

tagdetail.name: ReportingParty
tagdetail.description: Party confirming the votes.

tagdetail.name: RequestingParty
tagdetail.description: Party requesting the cancellation.

tagdetail.name: ResultPublicationDate
tagdetail.description: Date on which a company publishes the results of its meeting.

tagdetail.name: Resolution
tagdetail.description: Detailed information of a resolution proposed to the vote.

tagdetail.name: ResolutionProposalDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date and time by which security holders can propose amendments or new resolutions. This deadline is set by an intermediary.

tagdetail.name: ResolutionProposalMarketDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date and time by which security holders can propose amendments or new resolutions. This deadline is set by the issuer.

tagdetail.name: ResolutionProposalThreshold
tagdetail.description: Specifies the minimum stake in share capital or cash value or number of security holders required to table resolutions.

tagdetail.name: ResolutionProposalThresholdPercentage
tagdetail.description: Specifies the minimum stake in share capital or cash value or number of security holders required to table resolutions. This minimum is expressed as a percentage.

tagdetail.name: Reason
tagdetail.description: Defines the justification for the cancellation.

tagdetail.name: RevocabilityDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date till which the instructing party can revoke, change or withdraw its voting instruction. This deadline is specified by an intermediary.

tagdetail.name: RevocabilityMarketDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date till which the instructing party can revoke, change or withdraw its voting instruction. This deadline is set by the issuer.

tagdetail.name: RevocabilitySTPDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date till which the instructing party can revoke, change or withdraw its voting instruction. This deadline is specified by an intermediary (STP mode).

tagdetail.name: SEDOL
tagdetail.description: Stock Exchange Daily Official List (SEDOL) number. A code used by the London Stock Exchange to identify foreign stocks, especially those that aren't actively traded in the US and don't have a CUSIP number.

tagdetail.name: STPDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date by which the information on proxy assignment must be received by the intermediary (STP mode).

tagdetail.name: SchemeName
tagdetail.description: Name of the identification scheme, eg, "UK National Insurance Number".

tagdetail.name: SocialSecurityNumber
tagdetail.description: Number assigned by a social security agency.

tagdetail.name: SecuritiesBlockingDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date by which the securities should be blocked. This deadline is set by an intermediary.

tagdetail.name: SecuritiesBlockingMarketDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date by which the securities should be blocked. This deadline is set by the issuer.

tagdetail.name: SecuritiesBlockingPeriodEndDate
tagdetail.description: Date by which the blocking period for the securities should end.

tagdetail.name: SecuritiesBlockingSTPDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date by which the securities should be blocked. This deadline is set by the issuer. (STP mode)

tagdetail.name: SecuritiesQuantityRequiredToVote
tagdetail.description: Number of holdings required for a vote.

tagdetail.name: SecuritiesRegistration
tagdetail.description: Request to register the securities for the meeting.

tagdetail.name: Security
tagdetail.description: Identifies the security for which the meeting was organised.

tagdetail.name: SecurityIdentification
tagdetail.description: Identifies the security for which the meeting is organised.

tagdetail.name: SafekeepingPlace
tagdetail.description: Place where the securities are safe-kept, physically or notionally. This place can be, for example, a local custodian, a Central Securities Depository (CSD) or an International Central Securities Depository (ICSD).

tagdetail.name: Shareholder
tagdetail.description: Specifies the name and address of the shareholder to whom the rights to vote are transferred for resolutions added during the meeting.

tagdetail.name: SpecificInstructionRequest
tagdetail.description: Request to execute specific instructions, such as participation registration, securities registration or blocking of securities.

tagdetail.name: SplitVoteAllowed
tagdetail.description: Specifies whether it is allowed to vote in different directions for the entire holding.

tagdetail.name: StandingInstruction
tagdetail.description: Indicates whether standing instructions have been applied or not.

tagdetail.name: Structured
tagdetail.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services, that is presented in a formal structure.

tagdetail.name: StreetName
tagdetail.description: Name of a street or thoroughfare.

tagdetail.name: Status
tagdetail.description: Indicates whether the resolution is active or withdrawn.

tagdetail.name: SubAccountDetails
tagdetail.description: Identification of a subaccount within the safekeeping account

tagdetail.name: SubAccountIdentification
tagdetail.description: Identifies the subaccount of the safekeeping account.

tagdetail.name: SubmittedBySecurityHolder
tagdetail.description: Indicates whether the resolution has been submitted by the security holder.

tagdetail.name: TaxIdentificationNumber
tagdetail.description: Number assigned by a tax authority to an entity.

tagdetail.name: TickerSymbol
tagdetail.description: Letters that identify a stock traded on a stock exchange. The Ticker Symbol is a short and convenient way of identifying a stock, eg, RTR.L for Reuters quoted in London.

tagdetail.name: Title
tagdetail.description: Abbreviated description of the resolution.

tagdetail.name: Type
tagdetail.description: Specifies the type of meeting for which instructions are sent.

tagdetail.name: TotalNumberOfSecuritiesOutstanding
tagdetail.description: Number of securities admitted to the vote, expressed as an amount and a currency.

tagdetail.name: TotalNumberOfVotingRights
tagdetail.description: Number of rights admitted to the vote.

tagdetail.name: TownName
tagdetail.description: Name of a built-up area, with defined boundaries, and a local government.

tagdetail.name: URLAddress
tagdetail.description: Address for the Universal Resource Locator (URL), eg, used over the www (HTTP) service.

tagdetail.name: Unit
tagdetail.description: Quantity expressed as a number, eg, a number of shares.

tagdetail.name: Unstructured
tagdetail.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services, that is presented in free format text.

tagdetail.name: Vote
tagdetail.description: Specifies the conditions to be allowed to vote, the different voting methods and options, the voting deadlines and the parameters of the incentive premium.

tagdetail.name: VoteByMail
tagdetail.description: Specifies the address where voting ballot can be sent.

tagdetail.name: VoteByTelephone
tagdetail.description: Telephone number providing access to an automated voting system.

tagdetail.name: VoteDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date and time by which the vote instructions should be submitted to the intermediary.

tagdetail.name: VoteDetails
tagdetail.description: Specifies detailed voting instructions.

tagdetail.name: VoteExecutionConfirmation
tagdetail.description: Indicates that a Vote execution confirmation is requested.

tagdetail.name: VoteExecutionConfirmationIdentification
tagdetail.description: Identifies the vote execution confirmation message.

tagdetail.name: VoteIndication
tagdetail.description: Specifies the vote recommendation for resolutions added during the meeting.

tagdetail.name: VoteInstruction
tagdetail.description: Specifies how a party has voted for each agenda item.

tagdetail.name: VoteInstructionForAgendaResolution
tagdetail.description: Indicates the vote instruction for the resolutions which are announced via the meeting agenda in advance of the meeting.

tagdetail.name: VoteInstructionForMeetingResolution
tagdetail.description: Indicates the vote instruction for the resolutions that will be added during the meeting.

tagdetail.name: VoteInstructionType
tagdetail.description: Identifies the possible types of voting instructions. When used at the resolution level, it supersedes the value specified in the meeting notice.

tagdetail.name: VoteMarketDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date and time by which the vote instructions should be submitted to the issuer.

tagdetail.name: VoteMethods
tagdetail.description: Indicates the different methods that can be used to vote.

tagdetail.name: VoteOption
tagdetail.description: Specifies the different instructions which can be used to vote.

tagdetail.name: VotePerResolution
tagdetail.description: Details of the vote.

tagdetail.name: VoteResult
tagdetail.description: Results per resolution.

tagdetail.name: VoteSTPDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date and time by which the vote instructions should be submitted to the intermediary (STP mode).

tagdetail.name: VoteThroughNetwork
tagdetail.description: Network address through which a voting party can cast its vote via a structured message.

tagdetail.name: VoteWithPremiumDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date and time by which the vote instructions should be submitted to the intermediary to take advantage of the premium.

tagdetail.name: VoteWithPremiumMarketDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date and time by which the vote instructions should be submitted to the issuer to take advantage of the premium.

tagdetail.name: VoteWithPremiumSTPDeadline
tagdetail.description: Date and time by which the vote instructions should be submitted to the intermediary to take advantage of the premium (STP mode).

tagdetail.name: VotingBallotElectronicAddress
tagdetail.description: Electronic location, e-mail or URL address, where the voting ballot can be requested.

tagdetail.name: VotingBallotRequestAddress
tagdetail.description: Specifies the postal address where the voting ballot can be requested.

tagdetail.name: WithManagement
tagdetail.description: Number of votes in line with the votes of the management.

tagdetail.name: Withhold
tagdetail.description: Number of votes withheld for one resolution

tagdetail.name: ExtendedCode
tagdetail.description: Specifies the reason for cancelling a meeting in free text form.

tagdetail.name: ExtendedClassification
tagdetail.description: This code can be used in case another meeting classifications is required.

tagdetail.name: ExtendedReason
tagdetail.description: This code can be used in case another reason is required.
